reservedate.description: the date the hold was placed

cancellationdate.description: the date the hold was cancelled

priority.description: where in the queue the patron sits

found.description: a one letter code defining what the status of the hold is after it has been confirmed

timestamp.description: date and time the hold was last updated

waitingdate.description: the date the item was marked as waiting for the patron at the library

lowestPriority.description: Controls if the hold is given the lowest priority on the queue

suspend.description: Controls if the hold is suspended

suspend_until.description: Date until which the hold has been suspended

itemtype.description: If record level hold, the optional itemtype of the item the patron is requesting
